thumb.title: Purna Chandra Das & Ensemble India "Indian Street Music:The Bauls of Bengal" 1971
thumb.description: A1 #00:00Purna Chandra Das & Ensemble India "O ki garial bhai" Vocals; Hare Krishna DasDotara; Hare Krishna Das, Shuddhananda DasKhamack, Kartal, Ektara; Lakshman DasKhamack, Kartal, Nupur; Purna Chandra DasTabla; Jiban DasA2 #05:48"Moner katha bolibar age"Vocals; Shuddhananda DasA3 #13:03"O mon amar, shajo prokriti"Vocals; Lakshman DasB1 #21:23"Tin gorbhe ache ak chele"Vocals; Purna Chandra DasB2 #28:27"Chor poreche babur bagane"Vocals; Purna Chandra DasB3 #34:23"O bholar mon amar, anande hariguno gao"Vocals; Purna Chandra DasPurna Chandra Das & Ensemble India "Indian Street Music:The Bauls of Bengal"Nonesuch Explorer Series, Japanese edition 1971
